Statute.Title: Cape Breton Development Corporation Divestiture Authorization and Dissolution Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Société de développement du Cap-Breton à aliéner ses biens et prévoyant la dissolution de celle-ci, Loi autorisant la)

Minister.Text: Minister for the purposes of the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency Act (SI/2009-101)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2000, c. 23, ss. 1 to 6, 7(1), 8(1) and 9 to 17 in force on assent 29.06.2000; ss. 7(2) and 8(2) in force 03.06.2002 see SI/2002-92; ss. 18 to 22 in force 01.12.2011 see SI/2011-106
